text: Holi inho (kofiron) monandi odati qavmi Fir'avn ʙud, ki Musoro duruƣguj ʙarovardand va kasone, ki pes az onho ʙudand, onho ojoti Parvardigorasonro duruƣ sumoridand va Mo ʙa cazoi gunohonason halokason kardem va qavmi Fir'avnro ƣarq soxtem, zero hama sitamgor ʙudand. Pas incunin onhoro halok kardem dar Badr va ʙa'zeasonro ʙo asir aftodan xor kardem
